content:
Honored. Elated. Humbled. Delighted. In the past few weeks, the critics have come back with over 200 E3 2013 awards nominations – and while we knew we had a strong lineup of great games, we’re still grateful the gracious support from the gaming community. Below is a full list of every award and nomination so far. And a big thanks to everyone for recognizing the hard work of our talented and dedicated development teams! [title type="h3"]Watch Dogs[/title]   WON
  • Best Action Game – IGN
  • Best Original Game – Machinima
  • Best of Show – GameSpot
  • Most Valuable Game – PC Gamer
  • Most Valuable Game - @Gamer
  • We Love It – The Escapist
  • User Poll: Game of E3 – CVG

  • Best Game – Digital Spy
  • Best of Show – Game Front
